    public class LCDSubsystem
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    High-er level driver for the Driver Station LCD.
    Author:
    Luke Shumaker , Michael Andrzejewski

    • Field Detail

      • lines

        public java.lang.String[] lines
        The contents of the 6 lines, each index of the array is an LCD line. You can access these directly, just call update() when you are done.
        See Also:
        update()

        public void initDefaultCommand()

      • println

        public void println(java.lang.String line)
        Print a new line, and scroll the old lines. This calls update() for you.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the screen based on the lines[] variable.
        See Also:
